thread.title: Why Jeremy Kyle viewers might recognise Jose Mourinho's new minder
thread.title_full: Why Jeremy Kyle viewers might recognise Jose Mourinho's new minder

author: Jacob Murtagh
title: Why Jeremy Kyle viewers might recognise Jose Mourinho's new minder
text:
Why Jeremy Kyle viewers might recognise Jose Mourinho's new minder The Manchester United manager has been pictured alongside Dan - the same guard who flanks the 51-year-old presenter Share Jose Mourinho is guarded by Dan (Photo: Eamonn and James Clarke) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jose Mourinho is using the same minder as Jeremy Kyle, it has emerged. 
The Manchester United manager has been pictured alongside Dan - the same guard who flanks the 51-year-old presenter. 
Dan and fellow security staff are on hand to keep the peace when tempers flare on the ITV show. 
However, it appears he is also employed to ensure the Special One can go about his business without any fuss after being snapped an arm's length away from the Portuguese manager. Dan alongside Kyle on the ITV show (Photo: Eamonn and James Clarke) 
Mourinho guided the Red Devils to their first major silverware of the season on Sunday as Zlatan Ibrahimovic's late goal earned them a 3-2 win over Southampton 
to lift the EFL Cup. 
Ibrahimovic has now scored 26 goals in his debut campaign in England and Mourinho called on United fans to go to the forward's house and make him sign up for next season. 
Ibrahimovic has now scored 26 goals in his debut campaign in England and Mourinho called on United fans to go to the forward's house and make him sign up for next season. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now WATCH IN FULL: Mourinho's press conference post EFL Cup win Share this video Watch Next (Photo: AFP) 
The 35-year-old has been stalling on signing a one-year contract extension and Mourinho said: "I never bank for a player to sign a contract. "I never bank for a player to play for me. One day Zlatan decided to go to Barcelona and I was very sad and did nothing to try to stop him to go. So I don’t bank for players. 
"But, if needed, I think maybe United fans can go to the door of his house and stay there all night. If needed, I think they will go for sure. 
"We all want and all believe that he's going to stay with us one more season." Read More Mino Raiola refuses to confirm Zlatan Ibrahimovic will remain at United next season (Photo: REUTERS) 
The 35-year-old has been stalling on signing a one-year contract extension and Mourinho said: "I never bank for a player to sign a contract. "I never bank for a player to play for me. One day Zlatan decided to go to Barcelona and I was very sad and did nothing to try to stop him to go. So I don’t bank for players. 
"But, if needed, I think maybe United fans can go to the door of his house and stay there all night. If needed, I think they will go for sure. 
"We all want and all believe that he's going to stay with us one more season." poll loading Does Jose Mourinho deserve a new deal? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
